author: Ryan D. Brooks
title: System Safety Report
subtitle: DO-178

parameters.name: teamDef
parameters.label: Team Definition(s)
parameters.options: start from branch ATS find artifacts where art-type = {Team Definition} collect art-id as value, attribute{Name} as text

parameters.name: Version(s)
parameters.options: start from branch ATS find artifacts where art-type = {Version} and relation{TeamDefinitionToVersion}.side-A-id = teamDef

description:
• Selected Branch - provide the Branch to obtain the System Safety Report for
  • Code Root Directory - if specified, provides:
    • a file listing the directories to search
    • a directory to recurse into looking for files
  • Start Button - generates the report
